item.description:
I'm hitting up QQ with at least other person this Saturday, and all are welcome. I'm bringing three ropes, and plan on setting up one in the 5.6 to 5.8 range, one in the 5.8 to 5.10 range, and the third somewhere else. :) I'm hoping someone else can bring more ropes, etc?

I won't be getting down there until after 1pm, so I'm planning on staying as long as I can into the evening. If you plan to stay late with us, bring a jacket! It gets chilly when the sun starts going down and the wind picks up.

The more people who have their personal gear, the better. If you have extra harnesses/shoes, please bring those as well.

For those who haven't been to the quarries yet: it's fine climbing, with lots of slabby routes. Plenty of variety overall, and lots of fun. Also, it's really close to Boston.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be around the pond, or by the buttress
item.why: Summer is here, and rock is outside. Real rock, ya know? Isn't that the whole point here? :)
item.name: Quincy Quarries Saturday!
